name: Coloring with a kitchen robot
description:
Short description:

Coloring with a kitchen robot is a co-op, where your partners are short-tempered robots. 

Goal:

Complete your orders, indicated by the bubbles popping out on the screen, while keeping up with your partners' tasks. Make sure they don't wait.

Controls:

WASD/Arrows - move

Space - interact

Help (just in case):

Bubbles will appear during a level indicating with their color what ball should be made.

The ball needs to be colored in the respective colors, then it must pass through what looks like an oven and finally shot by the cannon.

The robots will follow the order, but there is a chance to miss a step of the process, leaving for you to complete it.

The level ends when all orders are completed (top right corner), or when a robot runs out of patience.

This game was made as a part of the WOWIE! 4.0 game jam.
